entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assert debugging `System.Private.CoreLib` in `DEBUG` build #108951
    10.0.0
  • [release/9.0][wasi/wasm] SimpleBuildDoesNotFail compares with the wrong expected value #108938
    9.0.0
  • [release/9.0][wasi/wasm] Expected the multithreading runtime pack to be available when running on CI (after branch stabilization) #108937
    9.0.0
  • DefineConstants are getting overriden twice in Wasi.Build.Tests.csproj #108935
  • Regression over .net 8.0 #108934
  • JIT: Interprocedural Analysis (IPA) in .NET 10 #108931
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `JsonElement.Parse` accelerator methods #108930
    10.0.0
  • Performance regression in `Vector<T>.Vector<T>(T)` on x86/x64 #108929
  • Intermittent AccessViolation and NullReference exceptions in reflection-based JsonSerializer #108926
  • Hashtable has lower hash flooding resistance than Dictionary #108923
  • [Mono] JSImportGenerator.Unit.Tests.Compiles.ValidateSnippets test fails with MissingMethodException #108922
  • `DebuggerTests` other than `WasmTestOnChrome` timeouts in CI #108921
  • AndroidStripILAfterAOT likely causing "InvalidProgramException: Invalid IL code in ..." #108920
  • Type initializer for CDSCollectionETWBCLProvider threw exception - NullReferenceException in InvokeStub_EventSourceAttribute.set_Guid #108919
  • Non-english languages bug in terminal in .Net 8 #108918
  • JIT: De-abstraction in .NET 10 #108913
    10.0.0
  • Runtime System.Private.CoreLib patches pdbs #108912

Closed

  • [mono][Perf] `Reflection.Invoke` and `Enum.Parse_Flags` Regressions on 4/11/2024 11:29:08 PM #104777
    9.0.0
  • [mono][Perf] TensorPrimitive `MaxMagnitude` and `Truncate` Regressions on 7/10/2024 10:56:31 PM #106475
    9.0.0
  • Enable arcade -sign functionality in runtime #108605
  • Impossible to use LINQ with System.Text.RegularExpressions.EnumerateMatches method in .NET 7.0+ #108940
  • `System.Double.IsRealNumber(System.Double.PositiveInfinity)` is true #103930
    Future
  • .net core is slow, net.9 even slower, especially BigInteger #108933
  • Process.StandardOutput.ReadAsync read data super slowly #108894
  • `IHostBuilder.UseConsoleLifetime` equivalent when using `IHostApplicationBuilder` #108865
    Future
  • System.Text.Json serializes both parent and child properties when using inheritance, even when new or override is used in the child class. #108890
  • Suggestion: Support Member Functions and Static Functions in C# Enumerations #108897

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix HostApiInvokerApp test app setting DllImportResolver for hostfxr #108954
    area-Host
  • Fix JIT refusing to inline methods accessing static readonly arrays #108953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108952
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Allow the cdac build tool to roll forward to whatever SDK is available (prerelease or otherwise) #108946
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Ensure Vector.Create is properly recognized as intrinsic #108945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use `BitVec` with `bbPostorderNum` key to track visited blocks during value numbering #108943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update stepping through ExternalMethodFixup under the Debugger #108942
    area-VM-coreclr
  • ConditionalWeakTable - don't link Containers when no entries are transferred #108941
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix the ListenerElement.Attributes property #108936
    area-System.Configuration, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Track visited blocks in LSRA with post-order number-based `BitVec` #108932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Ensure a null PublicKey is supported on assembly refs #108928
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, regression-from-last-release, 9.0.0
  • Don't run trim-unfriendly ConcurrentDictionary test #108925
    area-System.Collections
  • Change the PAGE_SIZE to obtain from 'Environment.SystemPageSize' for CoreRoot testcases: 'MisSizedStructs_ArmArch' and 'Runtime_65937'. #108917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: Break up try regions in `Compiler::fgMoveColdBlocks`, and fix contiguity later #108914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Remove single-use APIs from CoreCLR PALRT #108944
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable using -sign in VMR scenarios #108908
    area-Infrastructure
  • Automatically synthesize ilproj assembly names for tests #108730
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Remove static monitor helper functions #107667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Stable branding for GA #108899
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #108871
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/9.0] fix guid version > 7 #108351
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime
  • Port NuGet Audit back to 9.0 #108854
    Servicing-approved
  • Rename Net5CompatImpl to CompatImpl #108881
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Ensure a null PublicKey is supported on assembly refs #108907
    area-VM-coreclr, regression-from-last-release, 10.0.0
  • Fix nativeaot outerloop #108916
    area-System.Globalization
  • Vectorize codegen for left shift operator on byte vector #108336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Consolidate LocateNativeCompiler target #103375
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasi] Remove unused string parameter from mono_wasm_load_runtime #104608
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Stop testing with V8 and `wasmconsole` #108711
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add ee_alloc_context (NativeAOT) #104851
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough checks in Compiler::TryLowerSwitchToBitTest #108106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • [cdac] ExecutionManager contract and RangeSectionMap lookup unit tests #108685
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move static helpers to managed #108167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Use loop-aware RPO for initial block layout #108903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement volatile barrier APIs #107843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move init class helpers to managed code #108029
    area-VM-coreclr
  • 2 accounting fixes #108880
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [wasi] Disable build in .NET 9 #108877
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoiding discarding exception details of `MissingMethodException` in `RuntimeType.CreateInstanceImpl` #108876
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add some missing docs in System #107726
    area-Meta
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2562151 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [CG] Bump Microsoft.IO.Redist to 6.0.1 #106102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • fix stack 2x2 tensor along dimension 1 #108620
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Avoid generic virtual dispatch for frozen collections alternate lookup #108732
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Remove redundant sign/zero extension for SIMD broadcasts #108824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add security design docs for Dictionary, HashCode, and StringComparer #108864
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Improve error message for TypedHttpClient missing constructor parameter #108670
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Fixed build error #108633
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Bump serialize-javascript #108883
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [browser] testing 4GB #108701
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Do not use link flags for bitcode compilation #108846
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser] disable debugger tests on CI #108178
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • System.Net Stress Tests Improvements 2 #108703
    area-System.Net
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix SortedSet.IsSubsetOf (and friends) 102118 #102249
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeouts in CustomConverterTests #108879
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
